ResearchProjectDef.label: Makai Communication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop a way of connecting an AI to a Makai device, allowing it to help decipher Makai technology.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Celestial Steel, a material of unimaginable power from outside this domain. You are now able to contact the main world of Makai. Perhaps they may willing to share some of it, for a price...

ResearchProjectDef.label: Makai Interdimensional Energy
ResearchProjectDef.description: A start of researching into receiving power from the Makai home dimension.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Makai Energy Reciever
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a dimensional reciever, and connect it to a Makai interdimensional power network.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Pure Energy Converter
ResearchProjectDef.description: We can't use pure energy as a power source by itself. We need to refine it into Star Particle first.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stardust Condenser
ResearchProjectDef.description: With star particle being obtained, this opens a pathway to many Makai Technologies previously inaccessible by normal means.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Celestial Steel Forge
ResearchProjectDef.description: Forge Celestial Steel. A type of material originating from Makai

ResearchProjectDef.label: Celestial Fabric
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft Celestial Fabric, a type of fabric originating from Makai. Its whole purpose is to hold the star. Hence the nickname "Star Cradle".

ResearchProjectDef.label: The Sun Cradle
ResearchProjectDef.description: Have you ever wondered what it feels like to take the sun that always hangs high in the sky, and hold it in the palm of your hand?

ResearchProjectDef.label: Celestial Structure
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a wall and floor using celestial steel.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Early Makai's Weapon Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: A blueprint for early mass-produced weapons from Makai.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Even as an early low tier weapon, they possess superior combat capability compared to their ultra-tech counterpart. But due to the different between universes, these are adapted to use local methods of resupplying. Perhaps if we reseach further into how Makai produce energy, we may come closer to what they are capable of.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Weaponizing Star Particle
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into converting star particle into weapon form.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stardust-powered Weapon
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build weapons powered by Stardust.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Guardian's Weapon Replica
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft a weapon which utilizes the very concept of all existence itself as a weapon.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: A weapon which utilizes the concept itself as a weapon. These are the pinnacle of warfare. The peak amount of power an individual could hold. The only thing stronger than these weapons are the true weapon of the Makai's Guardian themselves

ResearchProjectDef.label: Guardian Blessing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft an Apparel which gives the blessing of the Makai Guardian.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Essence of the Universe
ResearchProjectDef.description: To go further beyond first you must go back to the very root of the universe itself.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: The essence embodies various aspects of the universe, each has it own method to acquire it. The method to get it represents what each they are.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Essence of Knowledge
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into how to manifest Essence of Knowledge into our world.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Essence of Corruption
ResearchProjectDef.description: Essence of corruption can be cultivated from the mind of living creatures after being incubated with the seed of corruption

ResearchProjectDef.label: Essence of Flame & Frost
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into how to manifest Essence of Flame & Frost into our world. Contruct the necessary building and start the process of obtaining the essence.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Essence of Bond & Fate
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into how to manifest Essence of Bond & Fate into our world. Craft the base essence and follow its instructions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Essence Implantation - Fate & Bond
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into how to utilize Essence of Bond & Fate as bionics and implants to strengthen pawns. Operation will be available on any pawn once the essence is acquired.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Essence of Destruction & Death
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into how to manifest Essence of Destruction & Death into our world. Either Combine Essence of Death, Flame, and Corrupt to create essence of destruction, or use Destruction Singularity. As for essence of death, follow the recipes instructions in the altar.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Essence Implaantation - Destruction & Death
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into how to utilize Essence ofDestruction & Death as Bionics and Implants. Operation will be available on any pawn once the essence is acquired.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Essence of Order & Distortion
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into how to manifest Essence of Order & Distortion into our world. Essence of order process is similar to corruption. As for essence of distortion you combine Order and Corruption at the altar.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Essence Implantation - Order & Distortion
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into how to utilize Essence of Order & Distortion as Bionics and Implants. Operation will be available on any pawn once the essence is acquired.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Essence of Existence
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into how to manifest Essence of Existence, the final step to accessing the Primodial Forge. Combine every other essence together.

ResearchProjectDef.label: The Primordial Forge
ResearchProjectDef.description: The very root of all existence. The Primordial Forge. Now the universe is yours to change. The forge requires all essence including essence of existence to gain access to.
